amendment.description: To extend the termination date for the exemption of returning workers from the numerical limitations for temporary workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4523 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4523 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6378) To extend the termination date for the exemption of returning workers from the numerical limitations for temporary workers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4523 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4523 proposed by Senator Warner.
